name: Cleaner
desc: Helper class that cleans stored object state.

name: clear
desc: Clears state of multiple components.

name: clearOne
desc: Clears state of specific component.

name: Closer
desc: Helper class that closes previously opened components.

name: close
desc: Closes multiple components.

name: closeOne
desc: Closes specific component.

name: CompositeFactory
desc:
Aggregates multiple factories into a single factory component.
When a new component is requested, it iterates through
factories to locate the one able to create the requested component.

name: CompositeFactory
desc: Creates a new instance of the factory.

name: add
desc: Adds a factory into the list of embedded factories.

name: canCreate
desc: Checks if this factory is able to create component by given locator.

name: create
desc: Creates a component identified by given locator.

name: remove
desc: Removes a factory from the list of embedded factories.

name: ConfigParams
desc:
Contains a key-value map with configuration parameters.
All values stored as strings and can be serialized as JSON or string forms.
When retrieved the values can be automatically converted on read using GetAsXXX methods.
The keys are case-sensitive, so it is recommended to use consistent C-style as: 'my_param'

name: ConfigParams
desc: Creates a new ConfigParams and fills it with values.

name: addSection
desc:
Adds parameters into this ConfigParams under specified section.
Keys for the new parameters are appended with section dot prefix.

name: fromString
desc: Creates a new ConfigParams object filled with key-value pairs serialized as a string.

name: fromTuples
desc:
Creates a new ConfigParams object filled with provided key-value pairs called tuples.
Tuples parameters contain a sequence of key1, value1, key2, value2, ... pairs.

name: fromValue
desc: Creates a new ConfigParams object filled with key-value pairs from specified object.

name: getSection
desc:
Gets parameters from specific section stored in this ConfigMap.
The section name is removed from parameter keys.

name: getSectionNames
desc: Gets a list with all 1st level section names.

name: mergeConfigs
desc:
Merges two or more ConfigParams into one. The following ConfigParams override
previously defined parameters.

name: override
desc:
Overrides parameters with new values from specified ConfigParams
and returns a new ConfigParams object.

name: setDefaults
desc: Set default values from specified ConfigParams and returns a new ConfigParams object.

name: Context
desc: Basic implementation of an execution context.

name: fromConfig
desc: Creates new Context from ConfigMap object.

name: fromTraceId
desc: Creates new Context from trace id.

name: fromTuples
desc:
Creates a new Context object filled with provided key-value pairs called tuples.
Tuples parameters contain a sequence of key1, value1, key2, value2, ... pairs.

name: fromValue
desc: Creates a new Parameters object filled with key-value pairs from specified object.

name: get
desc: Gets a map element specified by its key.

name: ContextInfo
desc:
Context information component that provides detail information
about execution context: container or/and process.

name: ContextInfo
desc: Creates a new instance of this context info.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: contextId
desc:
Gets the unique context id.
Usually it is the current host name.

name: description
desc: Gets the human-readable description of the context.

name: fromConfig
desc: Creates a new ContextInfo and sets its configuration parameters.

name: name
desc: Gets the context name.

name: properties
desc: Gets context additional parameters.

name: startTime
desc: Gets the context start time.

name: uptime
desc: Calculates the context uptime as from the start time.

name: ContextResolver
desc:
Context resolver that processes context and extracts values from there.
See IContext

name: getClient
desc: Extracts client name from execution context.

name: getTraceId
desc: Extracts trace id from execution context.

name: getUser
desc: Extracts user name (identifier) from execution context.

name: CreateException
desc: Error raised when factory is not able to create requested component.

name: CreateException
desc: Creates an error instance and assigns its values.

name: DefaultInfoFactory
desc: Creates information components by their descriptors.

name: DefaultInfoFactory
desc: Create a new instance of the factory.

name: DependencyResolver
desc: Helper class for resolving component dependencies.

name: DependencyResolver
desc: Creates a new instance of the dependency resolver.

name: configure
desc: Configures the component with specified parameters.

name: find
desc: Finds all matching dependencies by their name.

name: fromTuples
desc:
Creates a new DependencyResolver from a list of key-value pairs called tuples
where key is dependency name and value the depedency locator (descriptor).

name: getOneOptional
desc: Gets one optional dependency by its name.

name: getOneRequired
desc:
Gets one required dependency by its name.
At least one dependency must present.
If the dependency was found it throws a ReferenceException

name: getOptional
desc: Gets all optional dependencies by their name.

name: getRequired
desc:
Gets all required dependencies by their name.
At least one dependency must be present.
If no dependencies was found it throws a ReferenceException

name: locate
desc: Gets a dependency locator by its name.

name: put
desc: Adds a new dependency into this resolver.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets the component references. References must match configured dependencies.

name: Descriptor
desc:
Locator type that most often used in PipServices toolkit.
It locates components using several fields:

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: Descriptor
desc: Creates a new instance of the descriptor.

name: equals
desc:
Compares this descriptor to a value.
If value is a Descriptor it tries to match them,
otherwise the method returns false.

name: exactMatch
desc:
Matches this descriptor to another descriptor by all fields.
No exceptions are made.

name: fromString
desc: Parses colon-separated list of descriptor fields and returns them as a Descriptor.

name: getGroup
desc: Gets the component's logical group.

name: getKind
desc: Gets the component's implementation type.

name: getName
desc: Gets the unique component's name.

name: getType
desc: Gets the component's logical type.

name: getVersion
desc: Gets the component's implementation version.

name: isComplete
desc:
Checks whether all descriptor fields are set.
If descriptor has at least one '*' or null field it is considered 'incomplete',

name: match
desc:
Partially matches this descriptor to another descriptor.
Fields that contain '*' or null are excluded from the match.

name: toString
desc:
Gets a string representation of the object.
The result is a colon-separated list of descriptor fields as
'mygroup:connector:aws:default:1.0'

name: Executor
desc: Helper class that executes components.

name: execute
desc: Executes multiple components.

name: executeOne
desc: Executes specific component.

name: Factory
desc: Basic component factory that creates components using registered types and factory functions.

name: canCreate
desc: Checks if this factory is able to create component by given locator.

name: create
desc: Creates a component identified by given locator.

name: register
desc: Registers a component using a factory method.

name: registerAsType
desc: Registers a component using its type (a constructor function).

name: FixedRateTimer
desc: Timer that is triggered in equal time intervals.

name: FixedRateTimer
desc: Creates new instance of the timer and sets its values.

name: close
desc: Closes the timer.

name: getCallback
desc: Gets the callback function that is called when this timer is triggered.

name: getDelay
desc: Gets initial delay before the timer is triggered for the first time.

name: getInterval
desc: Gets periodic timer triggering interval.

name: getTask
desc: Gets the INotifiable object that receives notifications from this timer.

name: isStarted
desc: Checks if the timer is started.

name: setCallback
desc: Sets the callback function that is called when this timer is triggered.

name: setDelay
desc: Sets initial delay before the timer is triggered for the first time.

name: setInterval
desc: Sets periodic timer triggering interval.

name: setTask
desc: Sets a new INotifiable object to receive notifications from this timer.

name: start
desc: Starts the timer.

name: stop
desc: Stops the timer.

name: ICleanable
desc: Interface for components that should clean their state.

name: clear
desc: Clears component state.

name: IClosable
desc: Interface for components that require explicit closure.

name: close
desc: Closes component and frees used resources.

name: IConfigurable
desc: An interface to set configuration parameters to an object.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: IContext
desc:
Interface to specify execution context.
see Context

name: get
desc: Gets a map element specified by its key.

name: IExecutable
desc: Interface for components that can be called to execute work.

name: execute
desc: Executes component with arguments and receives execution result.

name: IFactory
desc: Interface for component factories.

name: canCreate
desc: Checks if this factory is able to create component by given locator.

name: create
desc: Creates a component identified by given locator.

name: INotifiable
desc:
Interface for components that can be asynchronously notified.
The notification may include optional argument that describe
the occured event.

name: notify
desc: Notifies the component about occured event.

name: IOpenable
desc: Interface for components that require explicit opening and closing.

name: isOpen
desc: Checks if the component is opened.

name: open
desc: Opens the component.

name: IParameterized
desc: Interface for components that require execution parameters.

name: setParameters
desc: Sets execution parameters.

name: IReconfigurable
desc: An interface to set configuration parameters to an object.

name: IReferenceable
desc: Interface for components that depends on other components.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: IReferences
desc:
Interface for a map that holds component references and passes them to components
to establish dependencies with each other.

name: find
desc: Gets all component references that match specified locator.

name: getAll
desc: Gets all component references registered in this reference map.

name: getAllLocators
desc: Gets locators for all registered component references in this reference map.

name: getOneOptional
desc: Gets an optional component reference that matches specified locator.

name: getOneRequired
desc: Gets a required component reference that matches specified locator.

name: getOptional
desc: Gets all component references that match specified locator.

name: getRequired
desc:
Gets all component references that match specified locator.
At least one component reference must be present.
If it doesn't the method throws an error.

name: put
desc: Puts a  reference into this reference map.

name: remove
desc:
Removes a previously added reference that matches specified locator.
If many references match the locator, it removes only the first one.
When all references shall be removed, use removeAll method instead.

name: removeAll
desc: Removes all component references that match the specified locator.

name: IUnreferenceable
desc: Interface for components that require explicit clearing of references to dependent components.

name: unsetReferences
desc: Unsets (clears) previously set references to dependent components.

name: NameResolver
desc:
A helper class that allows to extract component name from configuration parameters.
The name can be defined in 'id', 'name' parameters or inside a component descriptor.

name: resolve
desc:
Resolves a component name from configuration parameters.
The name can be stored in 'id', 'name' fields or inside a component descriptor.
If name cannot be determined it returns a defaultName.

name: Notifier
desc: Helper class that notifies components.

name: notify
desc: Notifies multiple components.

name: notifyOne
desc: Notifies specific component.

name: Opener
desc: Helper class that opens components.

name: isOpen
desc: Checks if all components are opened.

name: isOpenOne
desc: Checks if specified component is opened.

name: open
desc: Opens multiple components.

name: openOne
desc: Opens specific component.

name: OptionResolver
desc: A helper class to parameters from 'options' configuration section.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves an 'options' configuration section from component configuration parameters.

name: Parameters
desc: Contains map with execution parameters.

name: Parameters
desc: Creates a new instance of the map and assigns its value.

name: assignTo
desc: Assigns (copies over) properties from the specified value to this map.

name: containsKey
desc: Checks if this map contains an element with specified key.

name: fromConfig
desc: Creates new Parameters from ConfigMap object.

name: fromJsonString
desc: Creates new Parameters from JSON object.

name: fromTuples
desc:
Creates a new Parameters object filled with provided key-value pairs called tuples.
Tuples parameters contain a sequence of key1, value1, key2, value2, ... pairs.

name: fromValue
desc: Creates a new Parameters object filled with key-value pairs from specified object.

name: get
desc: Gets a map element specified by its key.

name: getAsNullableParameters
desc: Converts map element into an Parameters or returns null if conversion is not possible.

name: getAsParameters
desc: Converts map element into an Parameters or returns empty Parameters if conversion is not possible.

name: getAsParametersWithDefault
desc: Converts map element into an Parameters or returns default value if conversion is not possible.

name: mergeParams
desc:
Merges two or more Parameters into one. The following Parameters override
previously defined parameters.

name: omit
desc: Omits selected parameters from this Parameters and returns the rest as a new Parameters object.

name: override
desc:
Overrides parameters with new values from specified Parameters
and returns a new Parameters object.

name: pick
desc: Picks select parameters from this Parameters and returns them as a new Parameters object.

name: put
desc: Puts a new value into map element specified by its key.

name: setDefaults
desc: Set default values from specified Parameters and returns a new Parameters object.

name: toJsonString
desc: Converts this map to JSON object.

name: Reference
desc:
Contains a reference to a component and locator to find it.
It is used by References to store registered component references.

name: Reference
desc: Create a new instance of the reference object and assigns its values.

name: getComponent
desc: Gets the stored component reference.

name: getLocator
desc: Gets the stored component locator.

name: match
desc: Matches locator to this reference locator.

name: ReferenceException
desc: Error when required component dependency cannot be found.

name: ReferenceException
desc: Creates an error instance and assigns its values.

name: Referencer
desc: Helper class that sets and unsets references to components.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to multiple components.

name: setReferencesForOne
desc: Sets references to specific component.

name: unsetReferences
desc: Unsets references in multiple components.

name: unsetReferencesForOne
desc: Unsets references in specific component.

name: References
desc: The most basic implementation of IReferences to store and locate component references.

name: References
desc: Creates a new instance of references and initializes it with references.

name: find
desc: Gets all component references that match specified locator.

name: fromTuples
desc: Creates a new References from a list of key-value pairs called tuples.

name: getAll
desc: Gets all component references registered in this reference map.

name: getAllLocators
desc: Gets locators for all registered component references in this reference map.

name: getOneOptional
desc: Gets an optional component reference that matches specified locator.

name: getOneRequired
desc: Gets a required component reference that matches specified locator.

name: getOptional
desc: Gets all component references that match specified locator.

name: getRequired
desc:
Gets all component references that match specified locator.
At least one component reference must be present.
If it doesn't the method throws an error.

name: put
desc: Puts a new reference into this reference map.

name: remove
desc:
Removes a previously added reference that matches specified locator.
If many references match the locator, it removes only the first one.
When all references shall be removed, use removeAll method instead.

name: removeAll
desc: Removes all component references that match the specified locator.
